thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 105 of 7354
thread.title: Keith Woodbury
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by Keith Woodbury

author: Keith Woodbury
title: Keith Woodbury
text:
B and H consistently has the best prices on electronic gear and stocks more in the area of electronics than most other sites. Ordered material generally gets to me within a week (unless on back order) of being placed,
Staff are hands down the most knowledgeable I've ever dealt with and are extremely helpful - even if that means spending a fair amount of time with me.
While I've looked elsewhere for electronics, no place has ever come close to B and H in terms of time, knowledge, range of equipment and software and prices. It is far and away my favorite place to shop.
